direction.raw_text: Linda pulls Matt toward the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda hits the lights. The lab is now very, very dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda reacts to the voice as it grows nearer. She navigates the maze of equipment, heading toward the crack of light at the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda and Matt have reached the door of the lab. She pushes through it and slams it behind her.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Jesus!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Figured it out? You were always so clever.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) Hang on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get out of here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (yelling) You won't get away with this. They'll find out about you. They'll hunt you down.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The villagers with their torches? Lock up your daughters! Sorry, Lin. It's not gonna happen that way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) See, I've spent all my time down here thinking up this plan. When they find you, they'll find a pile of charred corpses. The result of a terrible accident, I'm afraid.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How can you be so brutal?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I guess because I don't have to look at myself in the mirror anymore (beat) Remember that first night I was out? I did something bad, just to see if I could get away with it. And when I did, I realized I could have it all. I can kill in broad daylight. And nobody's gonna tell the police they were fucked by a ghost. Anything I desire I can make happen, but not if people know.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Linda pulls Matt along.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm dizzy. I can't feel my legs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just keep going. I'll fix you later.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The doors explode open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda looks up and down the hall and pulls Matt inside the supply room. It's still blood soaked from earlier. Linda closes the door, sliding the deadbolt into place. Linda lots him drop like a heap onto the floor. She falls to her knees beside Matt, lying on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda pulls his scrubs open. The wounds are many and deep.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Matt... Matthew. Stay with me now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He surprised us. We weren't expecting...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Shhh. Don't talk.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ! Something slams against the door. Bam! Slams against it again. The old deadbolt is buckling. Linda looks around the room and sees the storage freezer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda helps Matt up and into the storage freezer.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) We gotta move. Hang on.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Linda grabs a metal bar and slides it between two hooks on the door and the jam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The storage room door blows open. Linda leans down next to Matt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He entire shirt is stained with blood. He's having trouble breathing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda picks up his hand. Grips it tight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matt smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She rips his shirt open... and sees his wounds. She grabs a vial of alcohol and dumps it on her hands and then probes the wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She rises, and looks outside the porthole into the room. Suddenly it fogs up and she almost sees a face. She stumbles backward, and the door starts rattling. Linda scrambles over to hold the metal crowbar in place. Sebastian pulls and rattles on the freezer door. To no avail. It's not gonna budge. Finally he gives up. The door stops shaking. Linda is relieved, briefly.  Still. Then she hears the click of the door locking.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Lin...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) I can't feel anything.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You feel that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A little...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Your losing blood, but he didn't hit the vitals.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) Sutures and thread.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: as the dial turns from forty-five degrees, down to negative twenty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Through the porthole, Linda sees the bloody footprints heading toward the door. She removes the metal bar and pushes on the door. It won't move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda looks around the storage room. She grabs a roll of duct tape and pulls off a length.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She takes paper towel and cleans off Matt's wound. She tapes it, using duct tape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A beat later, the compressor begins pumping Arctic air into the freezer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda returns to the door. Shakes it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Goddamnit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What're you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is temporary.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) You still with me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Barely.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just keeps getting worse.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We hear WHISTLING as we see a sheet of flesh fill out into a head as Sebastian slides on his latex head piece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda continues shaking the door. The lock holds. A tear rolls down Linda's cheek, but a strange thing happens. The tear drops freeze. Linda shivers as she pulls the icy tears from her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The inside thermometer has dropped to five degrees. Linda grabs the metal bar and starts smashing it against the porthole. The metal bar just bounces off the glass.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oh shit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A drawer opens, revealing a set of clothing neatly folded. Shirt, pants, shoes. They begin to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda drops the metal bar and slides down the wall, defeated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matt's head rolls back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She checks his pulse. Thank god he still has one, but he's not gonna last long. They're both already starting to turn a little blue. Linda stares desperately up at the shelves, trying to find some sort of advantage. Then she sees something. She looks back at the door lock and then she rises ... and grabs AN EXTENSION CORD coiled on the shelf.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: There's no way out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's got to be.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They say freezing to death isn't so bad. You just kinda pass out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Matt! MATT!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) We're not dying in here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Sebastian, dressed in street clothes, stands before the mirror applying make-up to his latex mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda finishes stripping the insulation off the electric cord. She grabs a hypodermic needle package, and her cold fingers fumbles with the package as she tries to pull out the plastic tube. She finally gets it out and she starts wrapping the stripped electric wire around the tube in a tight coil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian slides on a wig and checks his appearance in the mirror. Pretty smooth. Even from relatively close up, he could pass as normal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda furiously winds wire into a coil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian heads down the corridor. Lingering steam twists in and around the hallway, long wispy tendrils. Sebastian pauses for a moment, hearing A GROWL. Suddenly the hallway seems a lot scarier. From beneath his scrubs he pulls his own tranq gun. He listens ... hearing scraping and footsteps. Watching the water on the floor twitch. With machine like precision, he turns and fires. The tranq dart halts in mid-air and some invisible thing tumbles over. Sebastian continues down the hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda holds the plug end of the extension cord. The other end is wrapped into a tight long coil. Linda looks for an outlet, but can't find one. She looks at the overhead lights. A moment later she's climbing up the shelving. She wrap* a piece of fabric around her hand, and with a sharp punch she smashes one of the overhead light bulbs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian enters, fully dressed. At a distance it'd be hard to tell his secret. He pulls several chemicals off the shelves. Then he pulls a tray of test tubes over and begins mixing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda works on jerry rigging the two ends of the wire to the lightbulb, socket. Suddenly the coiled wire springs to life and flies against the nearest metal surface. She's made an electromagnet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian loads the filled test tubes into the centrifuge. Dozens of other vials are already slotted. He takes one of the left over vials, considers it a moment and then flings it over to the other side of the lab. The vial shatters and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A powerful explosion that rocks the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda feels the rumbling as she places the coil up against the door. The magnet attaches itself. Linda shakes the coil, trying to get the doorlock to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - We see the lock twitching. Shaking...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Linda shivers as she plays with the coil. Her eyes glaze and she stumbles backward. Her surgical scrubs, once soaked with sweat, are now frozen stiff. She composes herself and pushes back toward the door. Her heavy breath hangs as a low cloud of Mist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian looks over the dozens of other test tubes, calculating their combined power in his mind. Then he closes the top of the centrifuge. He taps a few commands into its timer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door lock twitches again and twists back. The door swings opens and Linda stumbles out, mashing into a supply shelf of oxygen canisters. The canisters tumble every which way as Linda tumbles to the ground. She scrambles to her feet and goes in after Matt, pulling his cold body out of the storage locker. She pulls stacks of paper down from, the shelves into a trashcan, grabs an industrial lighter and ignites the paper. She pushes Matt close to the small bonfire. As she does, the oxygen tanks catch her eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian exits the lab, locking the door behind him. He heads down the darkened tunnel. Something scampers in front of him. Small, not visible. Sebastian sends it reeling with a swift violent kick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian, dressed and in full latex, comes striding up the tunnel. He taps a code into the elevator vault doors. The vault doors open revealing the elevator. The doors slide open and Sebastian steps inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And there's Linda. Slicked with dirt and blood. She holds a oxygen container with a cut line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door starts to shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She hits the top of a LIGHTER duct-taped to the hose. A line of PRESSURIZED FIRE BLOWS into the elevator. WWHHHOOOOSSHHHH! Sebastian goes up in flame. Linda runs toward the elevator. Just as the door's about to close, she slides. Her foot jamming into it. She lets loose with the flame again. Sebastian, backed into the corner, has no where to go. He's yelling in pain. His latex FACE BUBBLES and burns. The surgical scrubs SINGE BLACK. With no other escape route, he dives toward the door. Linda looks up to see his flaming body fly over her, back into the corridor. Linda kills the tank as Sebastian continues to burn. The elevator lights flickers and the security panel goes up in a shower of sparks. The elevator dies. Linda pulls herself to her feet and turns to see... Half of Sebastian's head MELTED AWAY, his latex facade a gruesome smoke-damaged mass. His clothes are half burned revealing large blistering bubbly welts underneath, like deformed blackened bubble wrap. Sebastian crawls to his feet, but Linda hits him with another shot of flame. Sebastian pulls at his clothes as he crawls around the corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda stalks toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda turns the corner to see a heap of smoldering latex and clothing strewn about the corridor floor. Sebastian, looking like some ugly creature, pushes down the corridor. He throbs with his blackened skin blistering and cracking up and down his body. Linda lets loose another jet of flame. It's smaller than the first and doesn't quite hit Sebastian. Linda checks the tanks pressure gauge. It slowly drops. Linda follows the blackened horror into the maze of tunnels. But as he pushes along the corridor, his burns slowly re- absorb themselves. Sebastian is no longer visible. A quiet moment in the hallway as Linda realizes how vulnerable she is. She looks around for him desperately. Nothing. But something on the ceiling catches her attention. She blasts it with the last jet of her dying torch. THE SPRINKLER SYSTEM, hit by fire, comes to life. Water sprays down on the tunnel. Sebastian is caught in the downpour, his invisible frame outlined by water. It comes toward her, the hot skin steaming in the water. He grabs Linda and slams her against the wall. His watery hand smashes her across her face. Linda reels. On the floor, she looks to see Sebastian stalking toward her. She crawls away, but he grabs her by her hair, pulls her to her feet and slams her against the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian smashes her head against a metal post. Her head cuts open, blood dripping down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda collapses to the floor. Sebastian's foot presses against her neck, squeezing it. Linda gags for breath. But through the shoot of water that is Sebastian, we see something also... a watery smudge.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Authorization please?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Caine. One One One One One.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Authorization valid. Thank you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sebastian!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) I can't let you leave. Come on out and I'll give you one last chance.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You said it yourself, Lin. I shouldn't hold on to the past.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Aaaaaaahhhh!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh God!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You wanna see God? I'll show you God.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm gonna find everyone in your family and kill them-. Your sister... she never liked me. I think I'll go after her and her little boy first.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) I just wanted you to know that before you die.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: - smashes Sebastian with the metal bar. Sebastian slams against the corridor wall and sinks down. Matt staggers. It's taken all his strength to got there. He drops the crowbar and seeks the wall for support, he sinks to his knees by Linda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He gives her his hand and pulls her up into his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just as the two turn, Sebastian rises with the crowbar. He swings it with a yell. Matt pushes Linda out of the way, his arm glancing the blow into a conduit. The conduit splits open and severs ELECTRICAL wiring. The VOLTAGE shoots up the crowbar and into Sebastian. As the current pulses through his body, Sebastian vibrates. His blood vessels yank back to visibility, followed by his skeletal structure and major organs. Sebastian is slowly electrified. Smoke pours off him and he becomes more and more visible. Finally he collapses. His body throbbing in and out of visibility. Matt and Linda stumble away.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Thought I'd... thought I'd save you for a change.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) Let's got out of here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Just outside the lab... Linda tries to pry open the sealed doors with the crowbar. But she can't. Through the doors porthole she sees a collection of chemicals and the fire raging from the earlier explosion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matt peaks inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She sees the centrifuge... The timed counter on its face counts down from a minute. Fifty nine. Fifty eight. Fifty seven...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Nitro...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He said it himself... All they'll find is a pile of charred corpses.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's rigged the centrifuge.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: In an enclosed space, he'll wipe out the whole lab.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Linda and Matt move as fast as they can. They reach the burned out elevator. What the hell are they gonna do? We know the damn thing doesn't work. She swings her crowbar at the ceiling. The maintenance hatch comes down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda hooks the crowbar onto the hatch lip and pulls herself up. She reaches back down for Matt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda grabs Matt's hands and pulls for all she's worth. She struggles, but they both manage to got him through the hatch.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Grab on.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Forget about me. You go.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Fuck you. Give me your hands.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Three... two... one. The centrifuge springs to life. The centrifuge spins the two dozen vials slowly at first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda and Matt are on top of the elevator. Linda's hands search the wall. Bar fingers run across the smooth metal surface. From the little light below she can see a maintenance ladder that spans the entire height of the vertical tube. They look up and see it disappear into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Matt starts up, rung after rung. Linda climbs right behind him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Climb!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Climb!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The centrifuge spins faster and faster. The vials are starting to rattle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda and Matt pull themselves up the ladder as quick as they can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He does, through sheer force of will. Blood from his wound drips down on Linda's face. No telling how much further they have to go in this darkness. Light leaks in from the maintenance hatch below.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I can't. I'm going to pass out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Keep moving.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The centrifuge's whine has reached a fevered pitch. The vials shake violently. Then... one of the vials shatters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A HUGE EXPLOSION rips through the laboratory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The EXPLOSION rips through the lab doors. A MASSIVE FIREBALL rolls down the tunnel swallowing everything in its path. One of the phase shifted animals gets caught in the flames. We see its shape briefly before it disappears In a wall of fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ladder begins to shake. The entire shaft begins to rumble. Linda pushes Matt up as they scramble toward safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The FIREBALL blows into the vent. Starts rolling down it also.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More explosions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rolls toward the OPEN ELEVATOR. Slamming into it... The elevator flies upward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rumbling worsens. The two desperately cling to the ladder. They looks down to see... The elevator...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: flying up toward them, lifted by the explosion's SHOCK WAVES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The carriage accelerates toward them, faster and faster. Its loose cables whip around the shaft, slapping the walls around the pair. Its gonna hit them! Linda pulls herself close to the ladder and closes her eyes. She's pressed against Matt. The elevator... 50 feet... 40 ... 30 ... W0000000SH! It flames RIGHT BY THEM. When Linda opens her eyes, the elevator is HUNDREDS OF FEET ABOVE THEM and a wall of fire is below them, closing in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Panicked, Linda pushes Matt up the ladder as she stares down at the rising fire wall. But the fire dissipates before it hits them, though a stray tongue of flames reaches up to lick the soles of her feet. They hear a terrifying moan and looks up to see the elevator peaking far above her. It slows to a stop and BEGINS TO FALL.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oh God!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't look.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Move!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's coming down!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . Coming back toward them in complete free- fall. It's emergency brakes clamp down, slowing it. Metal against metal. Sparks flying. One of the brakes shears. Then another. The elevator unseats from it's tracks, SLAMMING against the walls as it TUMBLES. Linda sees that the elevator is out of control, and watches as it ping-pongs toward them... smashing into the access ladder, smashing into the wall. The elevator slows, but continues slamming side-to-side. Linda cringes as the elevator crashes into the wall above them. But it jams there, stopping. They pull their heads away from wall and look up. The elevator just hangs there, suspended. There's a small crawlspace between the elevator and the ladder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They begins to climb up again. Matt shimmies through the tight hollow, and squeezes out the other side, followed by Linda. She breathes a sigh of relief and just hangs there a moment when ... Ah! Something grabs her. A singed throbbing hand emerges from the darkness, gripping at her leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She kicks at it and sees a dark dirty face - a swirl of dirt, grime and smoke with hollow eyes - rise up the ladder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian pulls himself up Linda's body. Translucent dirty hands paving at the fabric of her clothes. Linda tries to climb with this thing on her. But Sebastian grabs her around the neck. She begins choking for breath. Linda fights to keep her grip on the ladder... She looks down at the ten foot drop to the elevator and then... She lets go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She and Sebastian plummet through the smoky haze and slam against the top of the elevator. Linda seems to hover a few above the elevator, Sebastian's shadowy outline below her. Matt painfully lowers himself down the ladder. But metal groans and the elevator drops another five feet. Linda struggles to her feet. Sebastian rises. A menacing dark figure stalking toward her. Linda pushes back from him. Sebastian grabs her by the hair and pulls bar over to the ladder. The elevator strains and groans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian presses her up against the ladder. Presses into her from behind. He has her trapped. His dirty hand reaches out and strokes her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sebastian pulls her hair back and kisses her neck with his filthy, dirt-smeared mouth and half-burned away face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda and Sebastian struggle. Matt reaches down to try and grab her, help her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda looks at her feet. The last elevator emergency brake grips its cable. She grits her tooth and grabs hold of the ladder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda stamps on the brake release. The ELEVATOR TUMBLES ... along with Sebastian. It slams into the fiery abyss a hundred yards below. Linda hangs, one hand holding onto the ladder, the other holding onto Matt. Matt pulls her back onto the ladder, using all his remaining strength.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: C'mon. Before it slips.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) It's him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sebastian, you fuck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get off me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let go of me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Remember the day we met? You were wearing a red dress and you were so pretty. Now... Now look at you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get off of her!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) Sebastian, stop it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You fucked it all up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go to hell.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Linda and Matt stumble out into the blazing sunshine. Emergency crews close from all directions, sirens roaring. A trail of smoke drifts higher and higher into the sky. An ambulance pulls up next to them and the paramedics hop out, immediately putting a blanket around her and treating Matt's wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Linda looks over her shoulder at the traces of the ruin and she sees a shimmer of heat rising from the ground... almost as if something was there.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What happened?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We lived.
dialogue.name: dialogue
